en: Each unit can attack only once a turn
column3: Each unit can attack only once a turn

en: Units have weaknesses and advantages - only troops can capture buildings but they have almost no chance against tanks and tanks can’t attack helis
column3: Units have weaknesses and advantages - only troops can capture buildings but they have almost no chance against tanks and tanks can’t attack helis

en: You can deploy soldiers in HQ but it is cheaper to do so in the barracks
column3: You can deploy soldiers in HQ but it is cheaper to do so in the barracks

en: A unit loses all its remaining AP for the turn when capturing a Tower
column3: A unit loses all its remaining AP for the turn when capturing a Tower

en: All production buildings require a soldier to maintain it - capturing them will cost you a soldier unit
column3: All production buildings require a soldier to maintain it - capturing them will cost you a soldier unit

en: HQ and captured Towers or Airports will produce cash in every turn
column3: HQ and captured Towers or Airports will produce cash in every turn

en: Cash can be spent for deploying units and movement
column3: Cash can be spent for deploying units and movement

en: Use your cash wisely - a big army will be slower and less effective than a small squad
column3: Use your cash wisely - a big army will be slower and less effective than a small squad

en: It’s never a good idea to send a unit onto the battlefield alone
column3: It’s never a good idea to send a unit onto the battlefield alone

en: Mixing unit types in squads gives you a strategic advantage
column3: Mixing unit types in squads gives you a strategic advantage

en: You cannot deploy a unit when the spawning point is blocked and neither can the enemy - block enemy factories with your units
column3: You cannot deploy a unit when the spawning point is blocked and neither can the enemy - block enemy factories with your units

en: Units can attack only adjacent tiles - so when your target is far away you should first move your unit closer
column3: Units can attack only adjacent tiles - so when your target is far away you should first move your unit closer

en: HQ is the most valuable building in game - if you capture the enemy HQ you will win the game
column3: HQ is the most valuable building in game - if you capture the enemy HQ you will win the game

column3: < NOTHING TO DISPLAY&#000a;< SELECT UNIT OR BUILDING

column3: * FREE AS FREEDOM, NOT FREE AS IN FREE BEER

column3: You need to complete this map first in skirmish mode in order to be able to upload it.

column3: DOWNLOAD NEW MAPS OR SHARE YOUR OWN CREATIONS WITH THE WORLD!

column3: Before you can start using online options, we need to register your device with our online system.

column3: Requesting Player ID failed. Please try again later.

column3: Requesting Player ID successful. Welcome to ToF Online!

en: Could not download a map. Please check if code is correct and try again.
column3: Could not download a map. Please check if code is correct and try again.

en: Map name may only contain alphanumeric characters and an underscore sign.
column3: Map name may only contain alphanumeric characters and an underscore sign.

column3: Map with specified name does not exists.

en: DO YOU WANT TO SEE THE REPLAY OF OPPONENTS TURN?

en: To start a new game, press the Create button on one of the free slots. If the button is disabled, it means that you need to download an online map first. Visit http://online.tof.p1x.in to find some! Once you have hosted a game, give the match code to your friend so they may join.
column3: To start a new game, press the Create button on one of the free slots. If the button is disabled, it means that you need to download an online map first. Visit http://online.tof.p1x.in to find some! Once you have hosted a game, give the match code to your friend so they may join.

en: While in a match, there is no time limit for you or your opponent to take a turn. Remember, you don't have to wait for your turn idly - you are free to play campaign, skirmish, or load into a different multiplayer match! Quitting the game is also an option, but would you do that?
column3: While in a match, there is no time limit for you or your opponent to take a turn. Remember, you don't have to wait for your turn idly - you are free to play campaign, skirmish, or load into a different multiplayer match! Quitting the game is also an option, but would you do that?

en: You are limited to only four match slots, so remember to clear the ones, that have ended.
column3: You are limited to only four match slots, so remember to clear the ones, that have ended.

en: you may have up to four simultaneous games
column3: you may have up to four simultaneous games
